value:
The seven kingdoms of Archanea are
uniting... And the people say I should
be entrusted with them all.

The darkness of war that once
enveloped Archanea has reached
this world... I can feel it.

Please, do not worry for my sake. I
may not quite look it, but I have seen
my fair share of conflict.$k$pYou should get some rest yourself,
however.

This? Oh, it's a medicinal drink Caeda
made for me. It's...just a little too
sweet...

Why do you risk your life to fight for
this kingdom? Heh, don't look so grim
at receiving such a question.$k$pI simply wish to hear your true
answer.

Hail and well met! I have heard very
good things about you from your
friend $Nf.
In pursuit of victory!
Good... Now I just have to keep it up!

Could this be the work of the dark
presence I sense?

If we combine our strengths, we shall
not fall to the enemy!

My name is Marth. For what reason
and for whom do you fight? I'd like to
understand your ideas of justice.

Ever since people began referring to
me as Hero-King, I've been pondering
the true meaning of justice.$k$pVictory births the defeated, and the
defeated vow vengeance through
clenched teeth.$k$pThis means history is forever doomed
to repeat itself.$k$pMy father struck down, my country
seized... I, too, have seen losses, so I
can empathize. $k$pAfter fleeing to safety, I swore to
restore my homeland with the help
of my comrades.$k$pIt was Nyna who entrusted me with
the Fire Emblem...and it strengthened
my resolve to fight on.$k$pI no longer fought for vengeance... I
fought for the people.$k$pI found victory only because I had
first found so many allies who shared
my new sense of justice.$k$pThey lent me their strength, and we
fought as one.$k$pAnd now, I have come to believe that
you share that same sense of justice.$k$pLet us continue to fight as one,
$Nu.
はっ！
行こう！
うああっ！
ぼくはまだ…！
We fight together!
I refuse to yield!
To the end!
Shine, Falchion!
Forgive me, friends...
はは
I'm Marth, Prince of Altea.
Has something gotten into you?
Legendary Hero? Please, I've done nothing so grand as to earn such a title.
I can accomplish nothing on my own. It's thanks to my friends I've come as far as I have.
My hope is for people of all worlds to live happily.
If I'm not dependable, everyone else will suffer for it.
As a friend, you are irreplaceable. I will protect you.
Right.
What's my move?
Together.
